paragraphs.content: Psalm 135
paragraphs.contentHtml: Psalm 135

paragraphs.content: Praise ye the LORD. Praise ye the name of the LORD; praise him, O ye servants of the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Praise ye the Lord. Praise ye the name of the Lord; praise him, O ye servants of the Lord.

paragraphs.content: Ye that stand in the house of the LORD, in the courts of the house of our God,
paragraphs.contentHtml: Ye that stand in the house of the Lord, in the courts of the house of our God,

paragraphs.content: Praise the LORD; for the LORD is good: sing praises unto his name; for it is pleasant.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Praise the Lord; for the Lord is good: sing praises unto his name; for it is pleasant.

paragraphs.content: For the LORD hath chosen Jacob unto himself, and Israel for his peculiar treasure.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For the Lord hath chosen Jacob unto himself, and Israel for his peculiar treasure.

paragraphs.content: For I know that the LORD is great, and that our Lord is above all gods.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For I know that the Lord is great, and that our Lord is above all gods.

paragraphs.content: Whatsoever the LORD pleased, that did he in heaven, and in earth, in the seas, and all deep places.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Whatsoever the Lord pleased, that did he in heaven, and in earth, in the seas, and all deep places.

paragraphs.content: He causeth the vapours to ascend from the ends of the earth; he maketh lightnings for the rain; he bringeth the wind out of his treasuries.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He causeth the vapours to ascend from the ends of the earth; he maketh lightnings for the rain; he bringeth the wind out of his treasuries.

paragraphs.content: Who smote the firstborn of Egypt, both of man and beast.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Who smote the firstborn of Egypt, both of man and beast.

paragraphs.content: Who sent tokens and wonders into the midst of thee, O Egypt, upon Pharaoh, and upon all his servants.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Who sent tokens and wonders into the midst of thee, O Egypt, upon Pharaoh, and upon all his servants.

paragraphs.content: Who smote great nations, and slew mighty kings;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Who smote great nations, and slew mighty kings;

paragraphs.content: Sihon king of the Amorites, and Og king of Bashan, and all the kingdoms of Canaan:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Sihon king of the Amorites, and Og king of Bashan, and all the kingdoms of Canaan:

paragraphs.content: And gave their land for an heritage, an heritage unto Israel his people.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And gave their land for an heritage, an heritage unto Israel his people.

paragraphs.content: Thy name, O LORD, endureth for ever; and thy memorial, O LORD, throughout all generations.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thy name, O Lord, endureth for ever; and thy memorial, O Lord, throughout all generations.

paragraphs.content: For the LORD will judge his people, and he will repent himself concerning his servants.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For the Lord will judge his people, and he will repent himself concerning his servants.

paragraphs.content: The idols of the heathen are silver and gold, the work of men’s hands.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The idols of the heathen are silver and gold, the work of men’s hands.

paragraphs.content: They have mouths, but they speak not; eyes have they, but they see not;
paragraphs.contentHtml: They have mouths, but they speak not; eyes have they, but they see not;

paragraphs.content: They have ears, but they hear not; neither is there any breath in their mouths.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They have ears, but they hear not; neither is there any breath in their mouths.

paragraphs.content: They that make them are like unto them: so is every one that trusteth in them.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They that make them are like unto them: so is every one that trusteth in them.

paragraphs.content: Bless the LORD, O house of Israel: bless the LORD, O house of Aaron:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Bless the Lord, O house of Israel: bless the Lord, O house of Aaron:

paragraphs.content: Bless the LORD, O house of Levi: ye that fear the LORD, bless the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Bless the Lord, O house of Levi: ye that fear the Lord, bless the Lord.

paragraphs.content: Blessed be the LORD out of Zion, which dwelleth at Jerusalem. Praise ye the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Blessed be the Lord out of Zion, which dwelleth at Jerusalem. Praise ye the Lord.
